Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'I noticed my memory fragmentations long ago.'}
{3: 'I have no recollection of the last days of the old Gray Raven. In my memories, we were together one day, and in the next, I was suddenly and inexplicably alone.'}
{3: 'I could not find info about my previous commandant, nor could I access the files on my former comrades. It was as if it was only me all along.'}
{3: 'Shards of my lost memories contest this statement.'}
{3: "I vague remember the members of the old Gray Raven, and the old commandant's tactical preferences."}
{3: 'Tandem attacks were a Gray Raven specialty.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory1.jpg'}
{2: '???', 3: "Hey, I'm over here! Where're you going!?"}
{2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'Urgh!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'That was our Corrupted rabbit, Hiro.'}
{3: 'Equipped for short-duration flight, Hiro would use his speed to bait the enemy into traps and ambushes.'}
{2: '???', 3: "The rest have been drawn off. We've just got this Riot left, right?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Affirmative. Take down the Riot model before Hiro comes back, then sweep and clear all Corrupted elements.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Five-by-five! Let's go, Murol!"}
{2: '???', 3: "Go right, I'll go left!"}
{3: 'The one on the left was Murol, Xun on the right. They were hybrid-type Constructs, able to adapt to changes on the battlefield and switch between attacker and support roles.'}
{3: 'By the time the Riot noticed the subtle change in its quarry, it was already too late. The fight was already over when it was separated.'}
{3: "An EM cable was shot from Murol's side and whipped around the lumbering Riot while Xun, giving himself a boost with the recoil from his cannon, grabbed hold of the cable, closing the EM lock."}
{3: 'The duo formed a makeshift tripwire within seconds, and as expected, the lumbering Corrupted form was unable to move out of the way and crashed into the cable.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{3: "Electric currents ran through the Riot's frame in an instant. Even without pain receptors, its internal modules were shut down from the massive short."}
{2: 'Commandant', 3: 'Lucia, strike the final blow.'}
{3: 'A long-range message from Commandant.'}
{3: "Commandant's body was flesh and blood, after all. In a combat scenario of this scale, standard procedure was to find a suitable vantage point to coordinate from afar."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It was a procedure to which we were well accustomed.'}
{2: 'Murol', 3: 'Hold up, how is this thing still moving!?'}
{2: 'Xun', 3: 'Must be the Punishing Virus. Records indicate that the virus has rewritten and repaired its hosts before.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Which also means that our attacks are working.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'My grip on my blade tightened. I sent instructions to Murol and Xun, telling them to keep the EM noose wound tight.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...I'll send you to your end!", 4: '1'}
